name: It's About Time
description:
Controls:

Moving - WASD/ ARROWS KEY

Interact - Z 

It's About Time - Its a short storytelling game made for Game Boy Showdown 2022.

Hope you gonna enjoy it. 

We were avaiable to make only demo but we are planning to continue this project. It's our first time joining any gamejam and this is the first game ever that we manage to do from scratch. We are proud of ourselves because despite 7 days we also had  our private life (University, Job, being sick and stuff like that). 

Capybara Squad is a 2 students team which include Game Designer and Graphic Designer.
